system:
note description: "EiffelVision popup window, GTK+ implementation" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xmlEV_POPUP_WINDOW_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_popup_window_i.xmlEV_POPUP_WINDOW_I undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_background_colorpropagate_background_color, ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_foreground_colorpropagate_foreground_color, ../implementation_interface/ev_window_i.xml#f_lock_updatelock_update, ../implementation_interface/ev_window_i.xml#f_unlock_updateunlock_update redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_makemake, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_default_wm_decorationsdefault_wm_decorations, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_client_areaclient_area, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_showshow, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_hidehide, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_internal_enable_borderinternal_enable_border, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_internal_disable_borderinternal_disable_border, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_grab_keyboard_and_mousegrab_keyboard_and_mouse, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_release_keyboard_and_mouserelease_keyboard_and_mouse, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_allow_resizeallow_resize, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_forbid_resizeforbid_resize, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_on_focus_changedon_focus_changed end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_makemake, ../implementation_interface/ev_popup_window_i.xml#f_initialize_with_shadowinitialize_with_shadow
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Connect interface and initialize ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_client_areaclient_area := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_event_box_newgtk_event_box_new ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP} {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_client_areaclient_area) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_addgtk_container_add (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_client_areaclient_area) if not ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_override_redirectOverride_redirect then {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_window_set_skip_taskbar_hintgtk_window_set_skip_taskbar_hint (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, True) end if ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_override_redirectOverride_redirect then {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_window_set_override_redirectgdk_window_set_override_redirect ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_struct_windowgtk_widget_struct_window (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object), True) end ../implementation_interface/ev_window_i.xml#f_disable_borderdisable_border ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_disable_user_resizedisable_user_resize ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_set_background_colorset_background_color ((create {../interface/ev_stock_colors.xmlEV_STOCK_COLORS}).../interface/ev_stock_colors.xml#f_blackBlack) ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_override_redirect../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_override_redirectOverride_redirect: FalseBOOLEAN = False
f_on_focus_changed../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_on_focus_changedon_focus_changed (a_has_focus: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Called from focus intermediary agents when focus for Current has changed. -- if a_has_focus then Current has just received focus. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_override_redirectOverride_redirect then if a_has_focus then ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_app_implementationApp_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xml#f_set_focused_popup_windowset_focused_popup_window (Current) else ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_app_implementationApp_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xml#f_set_focused_popup_windowset_focused_popup_window (Void) end end ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_on_focus_changedPrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP} (a_has_focus) end
f_grab_keyboard_and_mouse../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_grab_keyboard_and_mousegrab_keyboard_and_mouse -- Perform a global mouse and keyboard grab. do if not ../implementation_interface/ev_popup_window_i.xml#f_is_disconnected_from_window_manageris_disconnected_from_window_manager then ../implementation_gtk/ev_pick_and_dropable_imp.xml#f_grab_keyboard_and_mousePrecursor end end
f_release_keyboard_and_mouse../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_release_keyboard_and_mouserelease_keyboard_and_mouse -- Release mouse and keyboard grab. do if not ../implementation_interface/ev_popup_window_i.xml#f_is_disconnected_from_window_manageris_disconnected_from_window_manager then ../implementation_gtk/ev_pick_and_dropable_imp.xml#f_release_keyboard_and_mousePrecursor end end
feature {NONE} -- implementation
f_allow_resize../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_allow_resizeallow_resize -- Allow user resizing of Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_internal_enable_borderinternal_enable_border end
f_forbid_resize../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_forbid_resizeforbid_resize -- Forbid user resizing of Current. do end
f_border_width../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_border_widthBorder_width: FalseINTEGER_32 = 1 -- Border width of Current.
f_internal_enable_border../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_internal_enable_borderinternal_enable_border -- Ensure a border is displayed around Current. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_set_border_widthgtk_container_set_border_width (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_border_widthBorder_width) end
f_internal_disable_border../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_internal_disable_borderinternal_disable_border -- Ensure no border is displayed around Current. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_set_border_widthgtk_container_set_border_width (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, 0) end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xmlEV_APPLICATION_IMP} -- Implementation
f_show../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_showshow -- Map the Window to the screen. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_window_set_accept_focusgtk_window_set_accept_focus (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, not ../implementation_interface/ev_popup_window_i.xml#f_is_disconnected_from_window_manageris_disconnected_from_window_manager) ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_showPrecursor if ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_override_redirectOverride_redirect then if not ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_has_focushas_focus then ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_grab_keyboard_and_mousegrab_keyboard_and_mouse end end end
f_hide../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_hidehide -- Unmap the Window from the screen. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_override_redirectOverride_redirect then if ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_has_focushas_focus then ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_release_keyboard_and_mouserelease_keyboard_and_mouse if ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_in_destroyis_in_destroy then ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_app_implementationApp_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xml#f_set_focused_popup_windowset_focused_popup_window (Void) end end end ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_hidePrecursor end
f_handle_mouse_button_event../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_handle_mouse_button_eventhandle_mouse_button_event (a_type: FalseINTEGER_32; a_button: FalseINTEGER_32; a_screen_x, a_screen_y: FalseINTEGER_32) -- A mouse event has occurred. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_override_redirectOverride_redirect then if a_type = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_button_press_enumgdk_button_press_enum then if a_screen_x >= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_window_imp.xml#f_x_positionx_position and then a_screen_x <= (../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_window_imp.xml#f_x_positionx_position + ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_window_imp.xml#f_widthwidth) and then a_screen_y >= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_window_imp.xml#f_y_positiony_position and then a_screen_y <= (../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_window_imp.xml#f_y_positiony_position + ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_window_imp.xml#f_heightheight) then ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_grab_keyboard_and_mousegrab_keyboard_and_mouse else if ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_has_focushas_focus then ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_release_keyboard_and_mouserelease_keyboard_and_mouse end end end end end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_default_wm_decorations../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_default_wm_decorationsdefault_wm_decorations: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Default Window Manager decorations of Current. do Result := 0 end
f_client_area../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_client_areaclient_area: FalsePOINTER -- Container area of Current.
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_popup_window.xmlEV_POPUP_WINDOW note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_popup_window_imp.xmlEV_POPUP_WINDOW_IMP
